title: Макрон
overview: Provincial 23-year-old Andrey has long settled down in Moscow. Here he found his love - a 45-year-old beauty. He is not at all embarrassed by the big age difference; the newly minted "Macron" is so captivated by his girlfriend that he is ready to go with her to the registry office even tomorrow.Soon Andrei comes to his native village for his mother's birthday. And he shows up at the house not alone, but with his chosen one. A guy in love introduces the lady of his heart to his parents, but they are far from delighted with his romance with a woman who is their same age...
